import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; export const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", password: "", password2: "", }); // hook const { name, email, password, password2 } = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); // [e.target.name] makes it so we can use this for every feild dynamically return (

); }; export default Register;
